```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tibbletime)
```

## Part 1

```{r}
input <- readLines(here("data", "Day1_input_1.txt"), warn = FALSE) 

result_1 <- diff(as.numeric(input)) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  filter(value > 0) |> 
  nrow()

```


## Part 2


```{r}
roll_sum <- rollify(sum, window = 3)

result_2 <- diff(roll_sum(as.numeric(input))) |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  filter(value > 0) |> 
  nrow()


```
